title: Blue line flickers across my screen when Smite is on Cooldown
body:
Hello, I have encountered a bug which causes a thin line to flicker from the Smite Icon in the HUD all the way to the top left corner of my screen.
This issue is really annoying and I've seen other posts regarding this bug but yet no Riot employee seems to acknowledge this issue.
This bug only occurs when smite is on cooldown and it would be nice if there was a hotfix for this.
Below I have a screenshot of the issue I'm having although this screenshot is off another board post.
http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1418956975199/smitebugafter.png
